name: Pixeltron
description: Pixeltron is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box, retro console buttons, rocket arms and legs, and a classic screen, Pixeltron is a unique and eye-catching robot. It is equipped with advanced technology to analyze and display waveforms. As a member of the WebtrES club, Pixeltron is passionate about exploring the digital realm, tinkering with electronics, and mastering the art of waveforms. Its distinctive appearance and expertise make it a valuable asset to the club.
